name: Labyrinthian (itch) (Cosy  Kibble)
description:
A game made for the Zelda-Like game Jam.

-Controls-

WASD to move

Left Click to use sword

Hold Right click to aim crossbow

Release right click to fire crossbow

-Music Used-

Music from https://filmmusic.io

"Echoes of Time" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Bump in the Night" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
